long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There is no person who doesn't need a very simple and fast translator! 

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the MoTranslate extension, and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use https://motranslate.com/terms
and Privacy Policy https://motranslate.com/privacy-policy

The extension will update your new-tab with two translation boxes, where you can choose which language you want to translate something to.

You can select and write or paste any type of text into the translation box. For a basic translation job, you will be able to choose many different languages! 

Interesting and practical, MoTranslate is always at your fingertips, even if you forgot just a few words or want to completely translate a certain page. It is always available with a popup window to help you in any situation.
